com.team23.weather.owm

Class OwmClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team23.weather.owm.OwmClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocaleObserver, IOwmClient

    public class OwmClient
extends Object
implements IOwmClient, ILocaleObserver
    An OwmClient that implements the IOwmClient interface. This implementation of OwmClient also implements the ILocaleObserver interface, to listen for locale changes.
    Author:
    Saquib Mian
    See Also:
    IOwmClient, ILocaleObserver

      • searchForCity

        public Location[] searchForCity(String query)
                         throws IOException
        Search for the City given a query string. This query string is usually in the format: "city,country".
        Specified by:
        searchForCity in interface IOwmClient
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        a list of resulting Location object
        Throws:

                    throws IOException
        Get the weather for the location specified.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        IOException - if connection fails

      • getForecast

        public CompoundForecast getForecast(Location location)
                             throws IOException
        Get the short-term (hourly) forecast for the given location. This forecast will be returned according to this implementation defined in the OpenWeatherMap API, which at the time of this writing is 3-hour segments for 24-hours.
        Specified by:
        getForecast in interface IOwmClient
        Parameters:
        location - the location to get the hourly forecasts for
        Returns:
        a CompoundForecast object with the appropriate data filed
        Throws:
        IOException - if the connection failed

      • getDailyForecast

        public CompoundForecast getDailyForecast(Location location)
                                  throws IOException
        Get the long-term (daily) forecast for the given location. This forecast will be returned according to this implementation defined in the OpenWeatherMap API, which at the time of this writing is 24-hour segments for 15 days.
        Specified by:
        getDailyForecast in interface IOwmClient
        Parameters:
        location - the location to get the weather for
        Returns:
        a CompoundForecast object with the appropriate data filed
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection fails

        IOException - if connection fails
